meta.job_title: IBM Planning Analytics Senior TM1 Consultants

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and implement financial planning solutions using IBM Planning Analytics / TM1 to achieve project success as agreed with customers.
Deliver technical, functional, and business outcomes of a project while maintaining high standards of professional communication.
Analyze and evaluate business requirements through a structured methodical approach.
Define the solution scope, time, cost, and risk by translating business requirements into a set of functional and non-functional deliverables.
Estimate and plan project deliverables and success criteria.
Communicate with stakeholders, business and technical project teams to ensure the roles and responsibilities for the solution deliver are understood.
Identify all potential Change Requests and work with designated Principal Consultant/ Project Manager on these variations.
Participate in Post Implementation Review and assume ownership of any actions.
Research, design, and implement customer solutions and programs.
Identify opportunities and take action to help achieve business goals.
Identify process improvement opportunities and contribute to their implementation.
Participate in team collaboration and maintain a pro-active approach.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in a relevant subject – Engineering, Mathematics, Computer Science, Business, Finance & Accounting
